Fish Hunter

About

Forget the fishing pole, in Fish Hunter all you need is your trusty shotgun! Blast fish out of the water, but watch out for the sharks which are hunting you!

Too many fish? Sharks about to catch you? No problem! Unleash devastating multi-shot attacks, dynamite explosions, and freeze bombs to keep the situation under control.

Finally, compete with others for the title of Top Fish Hunter on the global scoreboard!

Features

✓ “Fish-R-Man 4000″ quick-shooting shotgun
✓ Colorful fish hunting graphics
✓ 2 game modes
✓ 13 unique fish types
✓ 4 devastating power-ups
✓ Global scoreboard

Availability

  • iPhone/iPod Touch and Palm Pre/Pixie
  • Coming soon for Android
